item.title: Tutorial
item.description: Topic 1 Exercise Here’s a simple exercise with an empty code chunk provided for entering the answer. Write the R code required to add two plus two: {"engine":"r","has_checker":false,"caption":"R Code"} Exercise with Code Here’s an exercise with some prepopulated code as well as exercise.lines = 5 to provide a bit more initial room to work. Now write a function that adds any two numbers and then call it:
